chatpdf.com.name: ChatPDF
chatpdf.com.reason: NotebookLM offers unlimited PDF uploads with AI analysis completely free. Users report ChatPDF struggles with complex documents and forgets context after a few messages.
chatpdf.com.system_prompt:
I'm uploading a PDF document. Please help me:
1. Summarize the key points and main arguments
2. Answer specific questions about the content
3. Extract important quotes, data, or citations

Start with a brief overview of what this document covers.

pdf.ai.name: PDF.ai
pdf.ai.reason: Claude offers free PDF analysis with a more generous context window. PDF.ai has a very limited free tier that quickly runs out.
pdf.ai.system_prompt:
I'll share a PDF with you. Please:
1. Analyze the document structure and content
2. Provide a comprehensive summary
3. Be ready to answer follow-up questions

Start with the main topics covered.

humata.ai.name: Humata
humata.ai.reason: ChatGPT Plus ($20/mo) includes PDF analysis plus image generation, code interpreter, and more. Or use the free tier for basic document Q&A.
humata.ai.system_prompt:
Please help me analyze this document. I need:
- A comprehensive summary of the main points
- Key takeaways and conclusions
- Ability to answer follow-up questions about specific sections

Start with the summary.

askyourpdf.com.name: AskYourPDF
askyourpdf.com.reason: NotebookLM provides similar conversational PDF features for free, with better source grounding and citation linking.
askyourpdf.com.system_prompt:
I have a PDF document I need help with. Please:
1. Read and understand the full document
2. Answer my questions with specific page references when possible
3. Summarize sections on request

What would you like to know about the document?

jasper.ai.name: Jasper AI
jasper.ai.reason: Jasper is explicitly built on GPT models. ChatGPT Plus at $20/mo gives direct access to the same underlying technology for 60% less. Users report billing issues and generic content quality.
jasper.ai.system_prompt:
You are a marketing copywriter. I need you to write compelling copy for my business. Please:
1. Ask about my target audience and brand voice
2. Generate multiple variations of headlines and body copy
3. Optimize for conversion and engagement

What type of content do you need today?

copy.ai.name: Copy.ai
copy.ai.reason: Copy.ai uses GPT models with a marketing-focused interface. Users report plagiarism issues (up to 18%), grammatical errors, and platform downtime. ChatGPT provides the same core capability directly.
copy.ai.system_prompt:
Act as an expert copywriter specializing in:
- Email marketing campaigns
- Social media posts
- Landing page copy
- Ad headlines

I'll describe what I need, and you'll provide multiple creative options. What would you like me to write?

writesonic.com.name: Writesonic
writesonic.com.reason: Claude offers superior long-form writing with better coherence. Writesonic's output often requires heavy editing to be unique and SEO-friendly.
writesonic.com.system_prompt:
You are a professional content writer. Help me create:
- Blog posts and articles
- Product descriptions
- Marketing copy

I'll provide the topic and key points. Generate well-structured, engaging content that's ready to publish.
